reviews.review_msg: Passionate and knowledgeable professor.  Would definitely recommend.
Excellent prof who is extremely interested and knowledgeable about what he teaches.

She's a really great prof if a little intimidating. She's a really tough marker so prepare for that. For the term paper she put different topics up on Canvas with a few sources because she didn't want us doing all the research? It was kind of weird but she was really helpful. She's not great on giving feedback on papers but she gives some.
She is awesome! Just keep up with the weekly reading and actually start the paper soon.
